name: Mentorship Program
description: Our flagship mentorship program pairs students from underserved communities with experienced professionals across various industries. Through one-on-one guidance, mentors help students develop career skills, build confidence, and navigate their educational journey. The program includes monthly meetings, skills workshops, networking events, and ongoing support throughout the academic year.

name: Academic Support
description: Our academic support program provides comprehensive tutoring and study skills development to help students excel in their studies. We offer subject-specific tutoring in mathematics, science, and languages, along with study skills workshops, exam preparation sessions, and personalized learning plans. Our qualified tutors work with students to identify learning gaps and build confidence in their academic abilities.
features: Study skills and time management workshops
Progress tracking and personalized learning plans

name: Career Guidance
description: Our career guidance program helps students explore career options, develop professional skills, and prepare for the workplace. Through career assessments, workplace visits, internship placements, and job readiness training, we equip students with the tools they need to succeed in their chosen fields. Our career counselors provide personalized guidance to help each student identify their strengths and pursue meaningful career paths.
